title: Is DXC Technology a product-based company? - Quora

response.answer_text: DXC is product based company which mostly have Insurance product in indore. Most work is related with production support work. Don't expect too much salary hike. All technologies used in projects are up to date. DXC is a good place to work . It provide work life balance to the employees and flexible working hours also if required based on the situation. Good place to work and management is also doing ok. Post merger of CSC technologies and HPES to form DXC Technologies, company is going through a an transformation. DXC is a good place to work . It provide work life balance to the employees and flexible working hours also if required based on the situation. Work environment is also very good. fun space to work at, the team which i was working was very socializing and good to work with (including the manager).
